languages.text: {n}Префект выпрямляется в кресле так сильно, что вы слышите надсадный скрежет ее имплантов. Ее голос сух и едва заметно дрожит.{/n} "Приказ ГЦ-781/89, дополнение 982. За хищение десятины, за участие в омерзительном колдовстве и за прочие преступления против Империума {name} фон Валанциус приговаривается к смерти. Имущество династии конфискуется и переходит под управление Адептус Администратум. Последнее слово, приговоренн{mf|ый|ая}?"

{n}The prefect straightens in her chair with such force that you hear the arduous grinding of her implants. Her voice is cold and slightly tremulous:{/n} "Decree GC-781/89, Supplement 982. For tithe theft, participation in foul sorcery, and other crimes against the Imperium {name} von Valancius is sentenced to death. The property of the dynasty is hereby confiscated and placed under the oversight of the Adeptus Administratum. Any last words, convict?"
languages.original_text: {n}Префект выпрямляется в кресле так сильно, что вы слышите надсадный скрежет ее имплантов. Ее голос сух и едва заметно дрожит.{/n} "Приказ ГЦ-781/89, дополнение 982. За хищение десятины, за участие в омерзительном колдовстве и за прочие преступления против Империума {name} фон Валанциус приговаривается к смерти. Имущество династии конфискуется и переходит под управление Адептус Администратум. Последнее слово, приговоренн{mf|ый|ая}?"

{n}The prefect straightens in her chair with such force that you hear the arduous grinding of her implants. Her voice is cold and slightly tremulous:{/n} "Decree GC-781/89, Supplement 982. For tithe theft, participation in foul sorcery, and other crimes against the Imperium {name} von Valancius is sentenced to death. The property of the dynasty is hereby confiscated and placed under the oversight of the Adeptus Administratum. Any last words, convict?"

languages.text: {n}Die Präfektin richtet sich mit einer solchen Wucht in ihrem Stuhl auf, dass du das Ächzen ihrer Implantate hören kannst. Ihre kalte Stimme zittert unmerklich.{/n} "Dekret GC-781/89, Zusatz 982. {name} von Valancius wird wegen Zehntraubs, Hexerei und anderer Verbrechen gegen das Imperium zum Tode verurteilt. Der Besitz der Dynastie ist hiermit beschlagnahmt und wird in in die Obhut des Adeptus Administratum übergeben. Irgendwelche letzten Worte, {mf|Verurteilter|Verurteilte}?"
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect straightens in her chair with such force that you hear the arduous grinding of her implants. Her voice is cold and slightly tremulous:{/n} "Decree GC-781/89, Supplement 982. For tithe theft, participation in foul sorcery, and other crimes against the Imperium {name} von Valancius is sentenced to death. The property of the dynasty is hereby confiscated and placed under the oversight of the Adeptus Administratum. Any last words, convict?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Präfektin richtet sich mit einer solchen Wucht in ihrem Stuhl auf, dass du das Ächzen ihrer Implantate hören kannst. Ihre kalte Stimme zittert unmerklich.{/n} "Dekret GC-781/89, Zusatz 982. {name} von Valancius wird wegen Zehntraubs, Hexerei und anderer Verbrechen gegen das Imperium zum Tode verurteilt. Der Besitz der Dynastie ist hiermit beschlagnahmt und wird in in die Obhut des Adeptus Administratum übergeben. Irgendwelche letzten Worte, {mf|Verurteilter|Verurteilte}?"

languages.text: {n}La préfète se redresse sur son siège avec une telle force que vous entendez le grincement laborieux de ses implants. Sa voix est glaciale et tremble légèrement.{/n} « Décret GC-781/89, amendement 982. Pour le vol de la dîme, sa participation à une répugnante sorcellerie et ses autres crimes contre l'Imperium, {name} von Valancius est {mf|condamné|condamnée} à mort. Les biens de la dynastie sont confisqués par la présente décision et placés sous la supervision de l'Adeptus Administratum. {mf|Le condamné a-t-il|La condamnée a-t-elle} une dernière déclaration à faire ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect straightens in her chair with such force that you hear the arduous grinding of her implants. Her voice is cold and slightly tremulous:{/n} "Decree GC-781/89, Supplement 982. For tithe theft, participation in foul sorcery, and other crimes against the Imperium {name} von Valancius is sentenced to death. The property of the dynasty is hereby confiscated and placed under the oversight of the Adeptus Administratum. Any last words, convict?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La préfète se redresse sur son siège avec une telle force que vous entendez le grincement laborieux de ses implants. Sa voix est glaciale et tremble légèrement.{/n} « Décret GC-781/89, amendement 982. Pour le vol de la dîme, sa participation à une répugnante sorcellerie et ses autres crimes contre l'Imperium, {name} von Valancius est {mf|condamné|condamnée} à mort. Les biens de la dynastie sont confisqués par la présente décision et placés sous la supervision de l'Adeptus Administratum. {mf|Le condamné a-t-il|La condamnée a-t-elle} une dernière déclaration à faire ? »

languages.text: {n}行政官坐在椅子上，挺直了身子，你甚至能听清她身上的植入物刺耳的摩擦声。她的声音冰冷，微微颤抖。{/n}“根据GC-781/89号法令，第982号补充条款，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯犯下了盗窃什一税、参与邪恶巫术，以及其他颠覆帝国的罪行，在此判处死刑。王朝财产全部没收，置于帝国内政部的监管之下。你还有什么遗言要交代吗，罪犯？”
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect straightens in her chair with such force that you hear the arduous grinding of her implants. Her voice is cold and slightly tremulous:{/n} "Decree GC-781/89, Supplement 982. For tithe theft, participation in foul sorcery, and other crimes against the Imperium {name} von Valancius is sentenced to death. The property of the dynasty is hereby confiscated and placed under the oversight of the Adeptus Administratum. Any last words, convict?"

traits.locale_text: {n}行政官坐在椅子上，挺直了身子，你甚至能听清她身上的植入物刺耳的摩擦声。她的声音冰冷，微微颤抖。{/n}“根据GC-781/89号法令，第982号补充条款，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯犯下了盗窃什一税、参与邪恶巫术，以及其他颠覆帝国的罪行，在此判处死刑。王朝财产全部没收，置于帝国内政部的监管之下。你还有什么遗言要交代吗，罪犯？”

languages.text: {n}La prefecta se endereza en la silla con tanta fuerza que oyes rechinar sus implantes. Su voz es gélida y levemente temblorosa:{/n} «Decreto GC-781/89, suplemento 982. Por hurto de diezmo, participación en hechicería impía y otros crímenes contra el Imperium, {name} von Valancius queda sentenciad{mf|o|a} a muerte. Los bienes de la dinastía quedan confiscados y confiados a la supervisión del Adeptus Administratum. ¿Últimas palabras, convict{mf|o|a}?».
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect straightens in her chair with such force that you hear the arduous grinding of her implants. Her voice is cold and slightly tremulous:{/n} "Decree GC-781/89, Supplement 982. For tithe theft, participation in foul sorcery, and other crimes against the Imperium {name} von Valancius is sentenced to death. The property of the dynasty is hereby confiscated and placed under the oversight of the Adeptus Administratum. Any last words, convict?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La prefecta se endereza en la silla con tanta fuerza que oyes rechinar sus implantes. Su voz es gélida y levemente temblorosa:{/n} «Decreto GC-781/89, suplemento 982. Por hurto de diezmo, participación en hechicería impía y otros crímenes contra el Imperium, {name} von Valancius queda sentenciad{mf|o|a} a muerte. Los bienes de la dinastía quedan confiscados y confiados a la supervisión del Adeptus Administratum. ¿Últimas palabras, convict{mf|o|a}?».

languages.text: {n}総監は背筋をピンと伸ばした。その力強さに彼女のインプラントの軋む音が聞こえる。声は冷たく、わずかに震えていた。{/n}「GC-781/89令、補足条項982。租税の窃盗、邪悪な魔術への関与、その他帝国への犯罪により、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスを死刑に処します。王朝の財産はここに没収され、帝国行政局の監督下に置かれます。被告人、最期の言葉はありますか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect draws herself up straight with such force that you hear the arduous grinding of her implants. Her voice is cold and slightly tremulous.{/n} "Decree GC-781/89, Supplement 982. For tithe theft, participation in foul sorcery, and other crimes against the Imperium {name} von Valancius is sentenced to death. The property of the dynasty is hereby confiscated and placed under the oversight of the Adeptus Administratum. Any last words, convict?"

traits.locale_text: {n}総監は背筋をピンと伸ばした。その力強さに彼女のインプラントの軋む音が聞こえる。声は冷たく、わずかに震えていた。{/n}「GC-781/89令、補足条項982。租税の窃盗、邪悪な魔術への関与、その他帝国への犯罪により、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスを死刑に処します。王朝の財産はここに没収され、帝国行政局の監督下に置かれます。被告人、最期の言葉はありますか？」

languages.text: {n}Prefekt öyle bir hışımla kendini dikleştiriyor ki implantlarının gıcırtısı sana kadar geliyor. Soğuk ve biraz da titrek bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "GC-781/89 Sayılı Kararnamenin 982 Sayılı Eki... {name} von Valancius; aşar hırsızlığından, habis sahirlikten ve İmparatorluk'a karşı işlediği diğer suçlardan ölüme mahkûm edilmiştir. Bu hükme binaen hanedanlık mülkiyetine el konulacak ve tüm malları Adeptus Administratum himayesine aktarılacaktır. Mahkûmun son sözü nedir?"
languages.original_text: {n}The prefect straightens in her chair with such force that you hear the arduous grinding of her implants. Her voice is cold and slightly tremulous:{/n} "Decree GC-781/89, Supplement 982. For tithe theft, participation in foul sorcery, and other crimes against the Imperium {name} von Valancius is sentenced to death. The property of the dynasty is hereby confiscated and placed under the oversight of the Adeptus Administratum. Any last words, convict?"

Soğuk ve biraz da titrek bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "GC-781/89 Sayılı Kararnamenin 982 Sayılı Eki... {name} von Valancius; aşar hırsızlığından, habis sahirlikten ve İmparatorluk'a karşı işlediği diğer suçlardan ölüme mahkûm edilmiştir. Bu hükme binaen hanedanlık mülkiyetine el konulacak ve tüm malları Adeptus Administratum himayesine aktarılacaktır. Mahkûmun son sözü nedir?"
